title: 4-year-old boy fatally shoots himself with gun found in home
content:
A Baltimore 4-year-old fatally shot himself with a gun he found in his home on Saturday, Baltimore police said.
Baltimore Detective Nicole Monroe said that Isaiah Deloatch found a gun in his home in the 400 block of N. Athol Avenue on Jan. 30. He died of a self-inflicted gunshot wound, she said.
Monroe said that homicide detectives were investigating the case and turning their findings over to the state’s attorney’s office, which will decide whether anyone will face charges in the boy’s death.
